英文法規名稱: Standards for Low Power Radio-frequency Devices Statutory Fee
中文法規名稱: 低功率射頻電機規費收費標準
沿革內容:
1. 4 Articles promulgated in full by the Ministry of Transportation and Communications（MOTC） on Jan. 27, 2004. Ref ：Jiao-Lu-Fa Tze No.093B000007
2. 6 Articles and the title amended and Promulgated in full by National Communications Commission（NCC） on April 26, 2007. Ref： Tung-Chuan-Ji Tze No.09605055630

法規內容.條文內容: These standards are promulgated pursuant to Article 70 of the Telecommunications Act.
The Low Power Radio-frequency Devices statutory fees include type approval fees and license fees.

The Authority(NCC) or Recognized Certification Bodies (hereinafter as RCB ) shall charge inspection fee as attached Table for “Low Power Radio-frequency Devices Statutory Fees”（hereinafter as Statutory Fee Table）with respect to every application for type approval of the Low Power Radio-frequency Devices（hereinafter as LP）.

If approving LP is under the scope of family series product, the second and subsequent products are charged half. However,apply for DoC family series product are excepted.
The aforementioned family series product has defined in Article 2 of the “Compliance Approval Regulations of Telecommunications Terminal Equipment”.

Those, who have lost, damaged or modified approval certificates or DoC certificates, shall apply for reissue or replacement to the original RCB, and the said RCB shall charge the certificate fees according to Statutory Fee Table.
The Regulations shall become effective as of the date of promulgation.
